text: wadhkr -ayha alrasul lqwmk- hin qal eisaa abn maryam lqwmh: 'iiniy rasul allah 'ilykm, msddiqana lima ja' qabli min altwrat, wshahdana bisidq rasul yati min baedi asmuh "ahmd", wahu muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm, wdaeyana 'iilaa altasdiq bh, falamaa ja'ahum muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam bialayat alwadhat, qalu: hdha aldhy jitana bih sihr byin
